subject: Pro pedals firmware update
description_text:
Hello,

I have the Simsonn Pro Pedals purchased off Aliexpress.  How do I update
the firmware on the controller box to work with the Simsonn Manager app?

https://www.aliexpress.com/item/1005006173126690.html?spm=a2g0o.order_list.order_list_main.5.27b01802vZq9nS

SIMSONN NEW PRO Pedals Sim Racing Pedals PC Racing Simulator Pressure
Sensor Load Cell HE Hydraulic Pedal for Pc Cockpit Pedal SPRO-P3-H3

Thanks,

Bin

conversations.body_text: I tried using SimPedals Config_V4 to enter flasher mode but it is telling me to use version 3.5 which does not have flasher mode.  Pedals was purchased on Mar 23, 2024.     9:10:09 AM > Incompatibe Firmware 9:10:09 AM > Please Use SimPedalsConfig V3.5  9:10:25 AM > Entered firmware recovery mode. Please do not power off or unplug the main controller during the firmware download process. 9:10:26 AM > Incompatibe Firmware 9:10:27 AM > Please Use SimPedalsConfig V3.5 9:10:27 AM > Incompatibe Firmware 9:10:27 AM > Please Use SimPedalsConfig V3.5
Hi Bin Ren,     If your version is 1.7.0, please use version V3.5.   https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download

Can the controller box be upgraded to 1.8?

On Wed, Nov 5, 2025, 1:16 a.m. service@simsonn.com
Hi Bin Ren,  If it’s version 1.7.0, it cannot be updated as it doesn’t include a bootloader.

Ok, thanks for the clarification.
Is the Plus X Control Box compatible with Pro pedals?

On Wed, Nov 5, 2025 at 3:10 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Bin Ren,    Yes, the Pro pedal can be used with the latest Plus X control box.
